snippet: Shares of Apollo Education Group, which runs the University of Phoenix, rose sharply after a group of investors raised its bid for the company.
abstract: Stocks rise as tech stocks recover from recent losses.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Apollo Education Group, which runs the University of Phoenix, rose sharply after a group of investors raised its bid for the company.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Higher After a Week of Declines
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Ends Higher After a Week of Declines
